statements: SELECT * FROM historical_attendance_data;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM historical_attendance_data WHERE attendance_count > 100;
SELECT event_name, marketing_strategy FROM historical_attendance_data ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(attendance_count) AS max_attendance FROM historical_attendance_data;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM historical_attendance_data GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT * FROM historical_attendance_data WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, attendance_count FROM historical_attendance_data WHERE attendance_count > 100 ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;
SELECT event_name, marketing_strategy FROM historical_attendance_data WHERE marketing_strategy IS NOT NULL AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, AVG(attendance_count) AS avg_attendance FROM historical_attendance_data;
SELECT * FROM historical_attendance_data ORDER BY event_date ASC, attendance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival_attendance;
SELECT festival_name, attendance_count FROM festival_attendance WHERE attendance_count > 100;
SELECT festival_name, date_attended FROM festival_attendance ORDER BY date_attended DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT festival_name, attendance_count, date_attended FROM festival_attendance;
SELECT * FROM festival_attendance WHERE attendance_count > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_audience LIKE 'youth%';
SELECT festival_name, date_attended FROM festival_attendance ORDER BY date_attended DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival_attendance;
SELECT festival_name, attendance_count FROM festival_attendance ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM festival_customers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT festival_name, city, country FROM festival_attendance fa JOIN festival_locations fl ON fa.id = fl.location_id;
SELECT * FROM festival_customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM festival_attendance ORDER BY date_attended DESC, attendance_count ASC
SELECT festival_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM festival_attendance GROUP BY festival_name HAVING total_attendance > 100 ORDER BY total_attendance DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM festival_customers WHERE age >= 18 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM festival_locations WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND country = 'USA'
SELECT festival_name, date_attended FROM festival_attendance JOIN festival_customers ON festival_attendance.id = festival_customers.customer_id ORDER BY date_attended ASC
SELECT * FROM festival_attendance;
SELECT festival_name, attendance_count FROM festival_attendance WHERE event_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendee_details ORDER BY attendee_name DESC;
SELECT marketing_campaign, reach_count, conversion_rate FROM marketing_data WHERE reach_count > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM location_data WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT festival_name, attendance_count FROM festival_attendance;
SELECT * FROM attendee_details WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT marketing_campaign, reach_count FROM marketing_data ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE city='New York' AND country='USA';
SELECT festival_name, event_date FROM festival_attendance WHERE attendance_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendance;
SELECT event_id, date, attendance_count FROM EventAttendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM FestivalParticipants WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY participant_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, marketing_channel, conversion_rate FROM MarketingData WHERE conversion_rate > 50;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM FestivalFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating <= 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT event_id, date, attendance_count FROM EventAttendance
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, registration_date FROM FestivalParticipants ORDER BY participant_name ASC
SELECT data_id, event_id, marketing_channel FROM MarketingData WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM FestivalTickets ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
SELECT feedback_id, event_id, satisfaction_rating FROM FestivalFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating >= 4
